title: The Searchers [Widescreen]
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Revenge
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture trailers
description: Ethan Edwards (John Wayne) resolves to find his niece, abducted by Indians at the close of the Civil War. It is an odyssey which takes five years, by the end of which he plans to take revenge on the Indians for the friends and family he has lost. John Ford used sumptuous Monument Valley as a background for this his most poetic and complex western. Cast includes Vera Miles and a young Natalie Wood. Based on a novel by Alan Le May. A documentary written and directed by Nick Redman entitled, "A Turning of the earth: John Ford, John Wayne and 'The Searchers'", featuring outtakes, home movies and the original theatrical trailer precedes the film. Introduced by Patrick Wayne.
